title.narrative: CHILD PROTECTION - IMPLEMENTATION

description.narrative: Improved capacity of institutions, communities and families to support an protect children, which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, Botswana fully implements policies and programmes towards the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and targets and national aspirations.

mailing-address.narrative: 1st Floor UN Place(Annex) Matsitama Road P O Box 20678 Gaborone

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved capacity of institutions, communities and families to support an protect children

description.narrative: Over 200 children’s cases were received through the child friendly police station this year with 76 undergoing investigation. Professionalisation of the social workforce will result in increased identification of children experiencing abuse and prevention of cases of abuse through support to parents by social workers. ;One hundred and ninety-six (196) Botswana Police Force officers received an introductory training on GBV and child protection. This is expected to lead to improved evidence collection and shorten the prosecution time for cases. | Status:Met | As-of Date:29/12/2021
